description: This file contains styles for theming and layout of the application, defining CSS variables for light and dark themes, as well as styles for the application header, logo, and a theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main container for the application, styled with background and text color variables.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the application logo, including size and animation.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the application, using flexbox for layout.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for the application links, utilizing theme colors.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the button to toggle themes, including responsiveness and hover effects.
